sermons.title: The Controversy of the Lord with His People
The Radical Controversy
sermons.description: "A Judaism that neglects or rejects Jesus the Messiah is, ipso facto, null and void, and is even in opposition to the truth of God." Can we say that to the Jew in love? It was the Church's predicament at the first and will be so in the Last Days when the scandal of the gospel is revealed. An earnest appeal.
